comments.content: Enhancement request. Can you add the following two renderers to http://code.google.com/p/osmdroid/source/browse/trunk/osmdroid-android/src/org/andnav/osm/views/util/OpenStreetMapRendererFactory.java 1) http://overlay.openstreetmap.nl/basemap/ 2) http://overlay.openstreetmap.nl/roads/ Both these layers are applicable to The Netherlands and Belgium. I would suggest to exclude them from the list of renderers (like FIETS). What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Please provide any additional information below.
This issue was closed by revision r415.
